turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Annie! Do you think you could call Starbucks and order a coffee for me to grab on the way in to the office?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! Which Starbucks do you want to stop at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Government Street in Mobile, Alabama.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! Do you have a specific drink in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do! I'm really craving a caramel cloud macchiato today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh that sounds good! Do you know what size you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande sounds pretty good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! What kind of milk do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% is what I usually get.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! Any extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra caramel on top!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope! That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a grande caramel cloud macchiato with 2% milk right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep! You got it! Need my card information?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nope! They've got card information on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's on order at the store and should be ready in a bit!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Will they send me a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They should by text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay! I'll see you in a bit!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good! Bye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!
